title: Blood is Black in the Moonlight: A Detective Devora Lobos Novel
description: Tampa homicide Detective Devora Lobos is on the trail of an elusive and faceless serial murderer known only as The Moonlight Killer, who is targeting high society leaving little evidence. The only thing Detective Lobos knows is that most of the previous victims are linked to the oil industry. This is not the average psychopath she is used to going after.Her stubborn determination to catch the methodical Moonlight Killer will lead her into a world of unexpected betrayal and political corruption and fly her too close to the sun.
author: William J Manning
